changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Create constraints and indexes for Enzyme nodes, created on 05/31/2022
changeSet.sql: CREATE CONSTRAINT constraint_db_Enzyme_eid IF NOT EXISTS ON (n:db_Enzyme) ASSERT n.eid IS UNIQUE; CREATE CONSTRAINT constraint_EC_Number_eid IF NOT EXISTS ON (n:EC_Number) ASSERT n.eid IS UNIQUE; CREATE CONSTRAINT constraint_Synonym_name IF NOT EXISTS ON (n:Synonym) ASSERT n.name IS UNIQUE; CREATE INDEX index_db_Enzyme_name IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:db_Enzyme) ON (n.name); CREATE INDEX index_EC_Number_name IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:EC_Number) ON (n.name);

changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load Enzyme enzyme.tsv from enzyme-data-05312022.zip, 8459 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:EC_Number {eid: row.eid}) SET n:db_Enzyme,n.name=row.name,n.code=row.code,n.activities=row.activities,n.cofactors=row.cofactors,n.data_source='Enzyme'

changeSet.id: load db_Enzyme synonyms from enzyme-data-05312022.zip, date 05/31/2022
changeSet.author: rcai

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (a:Synonym {name: row.name}) SET a.lowercase_name=toLower(row.name) WITH row, a MATCH (b:db_Enzyme {eid: row.eid}) MERGE (b)-[r:HAS_SYNONYM]->(a)

changeSet.id: load HAS_PARENT relationship in enzyme-rels.tsv from enzyme-data-05312022.zip, date 05/31/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load Enzyme HAS_PARENT relationships, enzyme-rels.tsv from enzyme-data-05312022.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row with row where row.RELATIONSHIP='HAS_PARENT' MATCH (a:db_Enzyme {eid: row.from_id}), (b:db_Enzyme {eid: row.to_id}) MERGE (a)-[r:HAS_PARENT]->(b) RETURN COUNT(*)
